Shielding Nimbus.name: Shielding Nimbus
Shielding Nimbus.flavor: Divine power surges through you, giving you an angelic visage and shielding you from damage.
Shielding Nimbus.effect: Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder. You gain resist 10 to that damage type until the end of the encounter. If you already have resistance to that damage type, the resistance increases by 5 until the end of the encounter.

Coldfire Pillar.name: Coldfire Pillar
Coldfire Pillar.flavor: You bond with an angel of vengeance, transforming yourself into a raging pillar of cold fire.
Coldfire Pillar.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier cold and fire damage.
Coldfire Pillar.effect: You are immune to cold damage and fire damage until the start of your next turn.

Angelic Blades.name: Angelic Blades
Angelic Blades.flavor: The metallic wings of an angel of battle sprout from your back and shower your foes with razor-sharp blades.
Angelic Blades.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Angelic Blades.effect: You gain a fly speed of 8 until the end of your next turn.
